name: Welcome to iPhone
heading: Reduce background noise
content: On a call, open Control Centre, tap Mic Mode, then tap Voice Isolation to make sure your voice comes through loud and clear

name: Genius Picks
heading: Blur your FaceTime background
content: Put the focus on you, not what's behind you. On a call, tap your tilr, then tap to turn on Portrait mode.

name: AirPods
heading: Hear your notifications
content: Siri reads your notifications as they arrive, To choose which notifications you hear, go to Settings > Notifications > Annonce Notifications
